A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Some new directions were taken with this film\, but overall (for me) there was a lot to like.

It moved away from the safe formulate that "The Force Awakens" provided. I felt that the pace of the film was nice. There was new tech\, new locations and new philosophies. 

Though I do have some regrets and reservations about some fan favorite characters. 

I'm interested to see what things the next film holds and I really wish Disney would branch out and start exploring some other areas with some live action shows. We all have lots of questions that need answers. 

4/5
